topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5541b6056368720888450100#post_5541b6056368720888450100
I'm going to college from home; I don't have to worry about getting a job cause I'm the one cooking and cleaning the house and I use very little electricity or water so I get to stay here free so long as I clean and cook.

I just feel like shit cause I was planning on full timing mtf by now, but it took me *SIX FULL MONTHS* to finally get my body hair down enough.  I'm sticking with it, but bloody hell is this time intensive.  I'm worried that cause my school year is starting that I'll have so little time to continue.  I'm just straight up stopping gaming for the most part and no longer following my favorite artists cause this metaphorical shit takes so much time.


Six months ago:
Friend, "It takes a lot of effort"
Now:
Me, ". . oh!  Well holy hell!"
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
